original_text: I did everything that I could to help my vineyard. I could have done no more! But when I waited to get sweet grapes from the vines, there were only bitter ones! Why was that?
korean_text: 내가 내 포도원을 위하여 행한 것 외에 무엇을 더할 것이 있으랴 내가 좋은 포도 맺기를 기다렸거늘 들포도를 맺음은 어찌 됨인고

sentences.original_text: I did everything that I could
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내가 할 수 있는 모든 것을 했다

sentences.original_text: I could have done no more
sentences.korean_translation: 더 이상 할 수 있는 것은 없었다

sentences.original_text: to get sweet grapes from the vines
